channel.description: Recent content in forecasting on The Delphi Blog

item.title: Can Symptoms Surveys Improve COVID-19 Forecasts?
item.description: Building on our previous two posts (on our COVID-19 symptom surveys through Facebook and Google) this post offers a deeper dive into empirical analysis, examining whether the % CLI-in-community indicators from our two surveys can be used to improve the accuracy of short-term forecasts of county-level COVID-19 case rates.
